definition[0]: to not see someone or something again, especially someone or something you do not like
example[0]: I thought we’d seen the last of him.
example[1]: It was a relief to see the last of them.
definition[1]: to not have to deal with something anymore
example[2]: Police hoped they’d seen the last of the joyriding.
example[3]: We may not have seen the last of this controversy.
